Title: Lobsters
Plot: Shane opens her own styling business, and Bette loses her position as the sole provider for the family, forcing Tina to take up a job under Helena. Now back in L.A., Jenny introduces Moira to her surprised friends. Dana and Lara make plans to visit France while Alice still obsesses over Dana. Meanwhile, Kit is surprised by The Planet's new manager who wants to make some drastic changes to the place.
GuestStars: Chelah Horsdal,  Tommy Danielowski,  Elizabeth Weinstein,  Patricia Idlette,  Judith Maxie,  Susan Mosher,  John Gray,  Frazey Ford,  Naomi Joy Gallagher,  Laura Mennell,  Keram Malicki-Sanchez
